PPLoc: Displayed on corporate website.  A link to the privacy policy is displayed on every page of the website that requests PI.
activities: KMS collects PI data for the purposes of populating employment forms and back office HR systems, at which point the data is purged from our systems.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe acts as our Third Party dispute resolution agency
